mapper.select: SELECT Id as id, Title as title, Poster as poster, Href as href, [Views] as views, Description as description, Active as active FROM Video
SELECT Id as id, Title as title, Poster as poster, Href as href, [Views] as views, Description as description, Active as active FROM Video WHERE Id = #{id}
SELECT Id as id, Title as title, Poster as poster, Href as href, [Views] as views, Description as description, Active as active FROM Video ORDER BY [Views] DESC

SELECT Id as id, Title as title, Poster as poster, Href as href, [Views] as views, Description as description, Active as active FROM Video WHERE Active = 1 -- Chỉ lấy các video đang hoạt động ORDER BY [Views] DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Video (Id, Title, Poster, Href, [Views], Description, Active) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{poster}, #{href}, #{views}, #{description}, #{active})
mapper.update: UPDATE Video SET Title = #{title}, Poster = #{poster}, Href = #{href}, [Views] = #{views}, Description = #{description}, Active = #{active} WHERE Id = #{id}
